title: Tomas Lavanini was self-centred and negligent as he swung into Owen Farrell - tackling lower saves players from potential fatalities
text:
They say that Tomas Lavanini’s red card ruined the game between Argentina and England. They say that there should be some sort of intermediate sanction between a red and yellow card, an orange card for argument’s sake, so that the offender can be replaced by a backup player, perhaps with only a 10-15 minute period of being reduced to 14 men so that the spectacle is not wholly spoiled for the watching millions and the integrity of the contest is preserved.

Well, here’s the thing. What about the four dead players lying in premature rest in various places round France whose only crime...
description: They say that Tomas Lavanini’s red card ruined the game between Argentina and England.
